caption: Relating to the applicability of sex offender registration requirements to the offense of indecent assault.
summary: This bill amends the Code of Criminal Procedure to include indecent assault as a reportable offense requiring sex offender registration after a second violation. The bill applies to all offenders regardless of nationality, including Chinese immigrants. While not specifically targeting Chinese individuals, any Chinese resident convicted of indecent assault twice would be required to register as a sex offender.
translation: 该法案修改《刑事诉讼法》，将猥亵性侵犯列为需要性犯罪者登记的应报告罪行，在第二次违法时生效。该法案适用于所有犯罪者，包括中国移民。虽然并非专门针对中国人，但任何两次被判猥亵性侵犯的中国居民都将被要求登记为性犯罪者。
committees:
